parts.text:
<output>
<analysis>
<has-cmf>The post includes a CMF number (CMF 11240060), indicating it's likely electoral propaganda.</has-cmf>
<refers-to-candidate>The post explicitly refers to REPER party candidates Gheorghina Marian and Florin Barbur, urging voters to choose position 10 on the ballot. This directly fulfills "Article 36 (7) - a".</refers-to-candidate>
<addresses-the-wide-population>As a paid Facebook post, it's designed to reach a wide audience, not just individuals. This satisfies "Article 36 (7) - c".</addresses-the-wide-population>
<electoral-objective>The primary objective is to encourage voters to support REPER candidates, directly influencing the election outcome. This clearly meets "Article 36 (7) - c".</electoral-objective>
<journalism>The post lacks journalistic objectivity. It's promotional material advocating for specific candidates, not providing unbiased information.</journalism>
<personal_opinion>The content isn't a personal opinion; it's a direct call to action for voting for specific candidates.</personal_opinion>
</analysis>

<conclusion>
<post_id>1271996963928121</post_id>
<electoral-propaganda-analysis>
The Facebook post promotes REPER party candidates Gheorghina Marian and Florin Barbur, urging voters to select position 10 on the ballot.  The presence of a CMF number, the explicit endorsement, the targeting of a wide audience through a paid advertisement, and the clear intention to influence voting behavior all strongly suggest this is electoral propaganda. The post's content goes beyond informing the public; it actively promotes specific candidates. While the post includes a link to a website, this does not negate the promotional nature of the post itself. The post's design and language are clearly intended to persuade voters to support REPER.
</electoral-propaganda-analysis>
<electoral-propaganda-decision>TRUE</electoral-propaganda-decision>
<electoral-propaganda-candidates>
  <candidate><name>GHEORGHINA MARIAN</name><impact>POSITIVE</impact></candidate>
  <candidate><name>FLORIN BARBUR</name><impact>POSITIVE</impact></candidate>
</electoral-propaganda-candidates>
<responsible-party-or-group>REPER</responsible-party-or-group>
<message-for-police>
Atelierul de internet SRL, pentru încălcarea articolului 98 t) din LEGEA nr. 208 din 20 iulie 2015, prin publicarea unei postări pe Facebook (ID: 1271996963928121) după ora 18:00 pe 23.11.2024, care promovează candidații REPER Gheorghina Marian și Florin Barbur, îndemnând alegătorii să voteze poziția 10 pe buletinul de vot. Postarea, plătită între 100 și 199 RON, a generat între 6000 și 7000 de impresii și a vizat o audiență de 100.000 - 500.000 de persoane, având un efect electoral clar prin influențarea votului în favoarea candidaților REPER. Prezența numărului CMF 11240060 confirmă natura electorală a postării, care depășește limitele jurnalismului prin îndemnul direct la vot.  Contact: andrei@atelieru.ro, +40755080070, Strada Garlei nr. 176, sector 1, Bucuresti.
</message-for-police>
</conclusion>
</output>
